meta.description: Determine which children the Zhang family should take on their trip to minimize the total cost.

sets.name: CHILDREN
sets.description: The children in the Zhang family.

params.name: cost
params.description: The cost of taking each child.

vars.name: take
vars.description: Binary variable indicating whether each child is taken on the trip.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[c] * take[c] for c in CHILDREN)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of taking the children.

constraints.name: max_4_children
constraints.description: The couple can take a maximum of 4 children.

constraints.name: take_ginny
constraints.description: Ginny is the youngest, so the Zhang family will definitely take her.

constraints.name: no_harry_fred
constraints.description: If the couple takes Harry, they will not take Fred.

constraints.name: no_harry_george
constraints.description: If the couple takes Harry, they will not take George.

constraints.name: george_fred
constraints.description: If they take George, they must also take Fred.

constraints.name: george_hermione
constraints.description: If they take George, they must also take Hermione.

constraints.name: min_3_children
constraints.description: The Zhang family has decided to take at least three children.
